ygData.subject: Ok question on comp specs? :)
ygData.msgSnippet: It seems that my questions are not getting less, but rather more frequent in nature. Ok, I was watching my comp when it was booting up. How much more mem will
ygData.messageBody:
It seems that my questions are not getting less,
but rather more frequent in nature. Ok, I was
watching my comp when it was booting up. How much more mem
will I need to acuire if it says that it has 98304K?
I'm pretty certain that I have a pentium 2 as my
friend bought that for me (and the pen 3 was just out so
it was all I could afford). I know that video and
sound cards are a must and they have already been
discussed so no need to open that can of worms. :) Well I
think that I have exhausted my brain's staying power
for the night (Need more coffee!) so I will say 'A
merry night to you. Catcha later.' The Raven
